Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Ah, hi @.$0#$b#Wow, this weather is hot....$0
Entries.marriage_loc1: Do you think we can explore this volcano?$0#$b#Willy said we shouldn't get close..$2#$b#But I still brought my sword.$1
Entries.marriage_loc3: Do you ever think of fighting these slimes, @?

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Oh, hey @. I'm finally here.$0#$b#I can't wait to spend the day with you.$1
Entries.marriage_loc3: Nothing's better than the beach on a hot day like this.$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Oh, @! That was quite the ride!$8#$b#It's a pleasure to see you again.$1
Entries.marriage_loc3: Ah, the view here is quite virtuous$0.#$b#I can feel an idea incoming...$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hi, @!#$b#This island is full of parrots, it's lovely!
Entries.marriage_loc3: @, do you feel it?$0#$b#These crystals are full of powerful energy.$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: @, can we go see the island today?$0#$b#There's something about this place that makes me feel at ease.
Entries.marriage_loc1: Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're here.$0#$b#I love how sunny the weather is.$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hi, honey.$l#$b#This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day.$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: I'll stay inside for a while, @.$0#$b#Make sure you stay hydrated in this weather, alright?$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Good morning, @.$0#$b#The weather here is so damp, i feel right at home.$h#$e#And the sun is strong...$8
Entries.marriage_loc1: You said there were caves here...i'll visit them later.$0
Entries.marriage_loc3: I've never seen crystals like these!$0#$b#My people loved crystals, you know.$0#$e#...$2#$b#...You're right. Maybe there's others like me out there.#$b#Thank you, @.$h

Entries.funLeave_Krobus: I'll go outside today...if i'm quick, your people won't notice.$0#$b#Thanks to you, i've become curious of humans' "Entertainment activities".$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: It's so quiet and peaceful here.$0#$b#It's the perfect weather for some wine.$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: The view here is inspiring, i just have to draw it.$0

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hey! What's up?$0#$b#I can't wait to see the stars at night.$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: @! Have you seen this?$9#$b#It seem there hasn't been volcanic activity in a while.
Entries.marriage_loc3: Professor Snail has been telling us about Ginger Island's history.$0#$b#It's amazing.$1

Entries.marriage_loc1: Oh, I'm reading the book about a sailor i told you about.$0#$b#It's very interesting.$1
Entries.marriage_loc3: Honey, Professor Snail's stories about the island are amazing.$0#$b#I didn't know they had so many traditions!$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hi, @.$0#$b#It's a nice island... isn't it?$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: Hey... have you ever gone inside?$0#$b#...$0#$b#Really?$8

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hey, I'm glad you're here.$h#$b#How have you been coping with this heat?
Entries.marriage_loc1: Man, this looks just like in 'Cave Saga X'...
Entries.marriage_loc3: I'm not one for crowded places.$0#$b#This place is perfect.$h

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hey, @.$1#$b#The tropical plants here are great.$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: Charlie seems to like this place.$8

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hello, dear.$0#$b#I'm ready for this island's hot weather!$1
Entries.marriage_loc3: The birds here...$0#$b#There's so many of them. I can hear them chirping.$1

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hello, my dear. This house is just as cozy as our farmland's.
Entries.marriage_loc1: The caldera in this volcano holds inmense arcane power.#$b#Only the most powerful of mages can cast the spells it requires.
Entries.marriage_loc3: The gentle waves of this beach...I've become accustomed to their sound.

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hello, dearest! I'm overjoyed to see you.$1#$b#This place is quite wonderful. You've made the house quite cozy.
Entries.marriage_loc1: The creatures of this island are aware of our presence. It has alerted them.#$b#Their arcane power is inmense...
Entries.marriage_loc3: The forge in this place...the rituals it requires are only mastered by a handful.#$b#Even with such mastery, the results are near impossible to predict.

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hi, sweetie. How is this weather treating you?$0#$b#We should invite Victor here someday.
Entries.marriage_loc1: Sautine City might have some competition...this place is just unique.$1#$b#You remembered i wanted a house in this island...didn't you, dear?$4
Entries.marriage_loc3: My, the ocean in this island is so clear. I would love to paint it some day.

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: @, can we stay here tonight?#$b#I'm really enjoying this trip.$0#$b#We can? Yay!$1
Entries.marriage_loc1: Oh, @! Look, there's some fishes in the water.$1#$b#They're nibbling at something.$1#$e#...H-hey, be careful if you go to that volcano over there, okay?$0
Entries.marriage_loc3: This? It's a manga i picked up the other day.$0#$b#Wanna read it together?$0

Entries.marriage_islandhouse: Hi, love. This beach is beautiful!#$b#Compared to Pelican Town, this weather is really hot...
Entries.marriage_loc1: So, this is the volcano dwarves used as an energy source...#$b#maybe we could go in someday.
Entries.marriage_loc3: Have you seen the bones here, @?#$b#These are quite ancient.

Entries.intro: Good morning. I'm the babysitter your spouse called, I'll be taking care of your children for the day.$0#$b#Don't worry, your spouse has told me everything i need to know of.$1
Entries.cc: I've heard a lot about this place from Emily.#$b#She said Pelican Town has changed thanks to you, @.
Entries.aboutstay: Did i tell you Gus is my boss?$0#$b#He's letting me stay at a spare room, in exchange of working at the saloon.#$b#I clean everything before clients arrive.$1#$b#It's a big place, so Gus doesn't mind the help.
Entries.spring_Sat_1: The other day, i saw something strange on the ground.$0#$b#When i checked what it was, it turned out to be some rice shoots.#$b#Who would even leave those on the ground?$2
Entries.summer_Sat_1: The other day, i saw something strange on the ground.$0#$b#When i checked what it was, it turned out to be a strange doll.#$b#Who would even leave that on the ground?$2
Entries.fall_Sat_1: The other day, i saw something strange on the ground.$0#$b#When i checked what it was, it turned out to be a blackberry.#$b#If only it wasn't all mashed up...$2
Entries.winter_Sat_1: The other day, i saw something strange on the ground.$0#$b#When i checked what it was, it turned out to be crystal fruit.#$b#Lucky, right?$1
Entries.Thu_1: Have you seen the train pass by?#$b#I've been told it's not that common over here.
Entries.woods: Hi, @. This place is lovely, isn't it? $0#$b#What, how i got here? Well. walking? how else?$1#$b#...what do you mean monsters? $6#$e#Are you sure you're not seeing things? Havent' seen any.$0#$b#I'll take care, i promise.
Entries.archaeologyHouse: When i don't have anything to do, i pass by the Museum.$0#$b#Sometimes you'll find a really good book.
Entries.forest: Being under the shadow of this tree is great.#$b#Specially when the sun is strong.#$e#Don't you like this forest, @?
Entries.forest_2: Do you hear that?#$b#It's getting late.
Entries.statue: I wonder, who was this person...$7#$b#Must have been someone important to be made this kind of statue.#$e#The place looks in ruins, so it must've been long ago.$0
Entries.reading: You want to know what im reading?$0#$b#Well...isn't it obvious? I want to know about the valley.$1#$e#%Devan is concentrating on the book.#$b#%You look at the cover. It says "Flora and fauna in Stardew Valley."
Entries.spring_15: Are you going to find salmonberries this year, @?%revealtasteDevan296#$b#Leah told me of a good spot where the juiciest grow.
Entries.spring_18: And there goes another spring...i'll miss the salmonberries. They were so good this year. %revealtasteDevan296
Entries.CommunityCenter1: Hi, @. Did you come take a break too?#$b#This place is huge. They even have a map.#$b#Look, pelican town is here!#$b#%Devan urges you to come closer, and points to a part of the map.#$b#%That's pelican town!
Entries.CommunityCenter2: Do you think i could use this?$0#$b#..What's with that face?$6#$#One day i'll master it, you'll see.
Entries.leahHouse: I wonder what Leah is painting this time.
Entries.spring_Tue: A salad with some leek, or a soup with spring onion... Oh, hi.$0#$b#I was thinking of what to have today.$1
Entries.spring_Wed: Hey. The town looks so nice at this time of the year.#$b#How's your farm looking? I bet it's a lot of work.
Entries.spring_Thu: I wonder how the strawberries will come out this year...they're so tasty.
Entries.spring_Fri: %...#$b#%Devan seems lost in thought.#$b#Ah, @. Didn't see you there.$6#$e#Isn't this time of the year nostalgic?
Entries.spring_Sat: I don't see many of the saloon clients, but Gus has told me about some.#$b#Apparently, a woman called 'Pam' visits often.
Entries.spring_Sun: Do you ever take a day off?$0#$b#A farm sounds like hard work.$0#$e#Though, i don't have free days either...$2#$b#At least the workload isn't that bad.
Entries.summer_Tue: Hey, are you going to plant blueberries this summer?$0#$b#I know a good Blueberry Tart recipe.$1#$e#Maybe one day i'll share it with you.
Entries.summer_Wed: I've heard there's an important event this season.#$b#The Luau...that's when the governor visits, right?#$e#I heard that once, someone put a pound of anchovies in the soup...$2
Entries.summer_Thu: I clean the saloon in the mornings.#$b#A lot of people stay in the saloon until past 2AM, so it's more effective this way.#$e#Gladly, the noise doesn't get so much to my room.
Entries.summer_Fri: It's not too nice to stay inside at this time of the year.$0#$b#My room in the salon is after a few halls, so it doesn't have the best ventilation.$0#$e#And i have to get past a bunch of barrels before going out, too...$2
Entries.summer_Sat: Hi. Are you going to the beach anywhere soon?$0#$b#Elliott's cabin is right in front of it. It must be nice in this type of weather.$0#$e#Maybe i'll pay him a visit soon.$1
Entries.summer_Sun: I've heard a lot of driftwood shows up in this season of the year.#$b#I bet Leah must be happy.
Entries.fall_Tue: I spend the mornings cleaning thoroughly, so i enjoy the afternoon as much as i can.#$b#The railroad is specially calm in comparison to the saloon.
Entries.fall_Wed: This season is perfect for growing grapes and cranberries.$0#$b#Trust me, they're very efficient.$1
Entries.fall_Thu: Gus is preparing a special plate today...#$b#If you're interested, feel free to pass by the saloon.$1
Entries.fall_Fri: Have you grown fairy roses?#$b#I've heard they smell fantastic.
Entries.fall_Sat: It's kind of windy at this time of the year, isn't it?#$b#A lot of leaves fall off the trees, too.
Entries.fall_Sun: The smell of pumpkins is so nice...#$b#What kind of things do you grow in your farm, @?
Entries.winter_Tue: It's hard to find fresh ingredients in this season.#$b#Gladly, Gus has a lot of storage.
Entries.winter_Wed: Hi, @. How are you handling the weather?$0#$b#Well, i feel i'm going to catch a cold...$2
Entries.winter_Thu: If anything saves this weather, it's the crystal fruit.#$b#It's the one thing i look forward to in winter.
Entries.winter_Fri: This town is so cold...#$b#Compared to other places, i find it more than chilly.#$e#Or maybe the other towns i've visited were simply warmer.
Entries.winter_Sat: Hello. What-$0#$b#%Devan sneezes.#$b#Sorry. I don't handle this weather very well.$0#$e#How come you never get sick...?$0
Entries.winter_Sun: It's so cold today...$0#$b#You better warm up.$0#$e#Luckily, the saloon has good insulation.$1
Entries.nightmarket: This traveling cart...$0#$b#I've never seen one like it before.$0#$b#And it's led by a pig, too...$6
Entries.winterstar: Ah, hello.$0#$b#Have you tried Gus' candy canes? They turned out great.$0#$b#He prepared for a while to find the best ingredients.$1
Entries.icefes: The best of this festival, you say...?$0#$b#I love to see everyone's snowmen.$0#$e#But, specially, i like Leah's ice sculptures.$1
Entries.spiritseve: Ive heard they made an impossible labyrinth over there...$0#$b#Maybe i'll go check it out later.$1
Entries.sdvfair_saw8h: These chickens look very well cared for.$0#$b#It shows that Marnie loves them very much.$1
Entries.moonjellies: Moonlight jellies... i'd never heard of that.$0#$b#Can't wait to see them.$1
Entries.luau: %Devan seems to be having fun with Emily.
Entries.flowerdance: Mm...delicious.$8#$b#@, try some. I bet you'll love it.$1
Entries.eggfestival: Will you participate in the festival?#$b#Me? Not really. I prefer watching everyone compete. It's more exciting.

Entries.Saloon.DevanBook: A book about trains in detail.

Entries.Devan: I love this! How did you know?/395 432 424 296/Thanks, @. This is great./399 410 403 240/...I'm not sure i can use this./86 84 80 446/...Ugh, is this a joke?/287 288 348 346 303 459 873/Thanks, i'll save it./82 440 349 246/
{{PlayerName}},^I found this while buying groceries, and thought of you. I bet it'll be useful for your farm.   ^   -Devan%item object 270 1 424 1 256 2 419 1 264 1 400 1 254 1 %%[#]A Gift From Devan
Will you participate in the festival?#$b#Me? Not really. I prefer watching everyone compete. It's more exciting.
Mm...delicious.$8#$b#@, try some. I bet you'll love it.$1
%Devan seems to be having fun with Emily.
Moonlight jellies... i'd never heard of that.$0#$b#Can't wait to see them.$1
These chickens look very well cared for...$0#$b#It shows that Marnie loves them very much.$1
Ive heard they made an impossible labyrinth over there...$0#$b#Maybe i'll go check it out later.$1

Entries.11037500/F/f Devan 500/p Devan: breezy/32 45/Devan 39 41 2 farmer 29 47 0/skippable/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer 5 0 1 continue/viewport move 1 -1 3000/pause 500/emote Devan 16/pause 1000/quickQuestion @?#What are you doing?#Are you waiting for someone?#(break)speak Devan "I'm waiting for a train to pass by$0.#$b#They don't show up often, but the wait is worth it.$0#$b#Like birdwatching, but with trains."(break)speak Devan "No, not really."/speak Devan "I'm waiting for a train to pass by$0.#$b#They don't show up often, but the wait is worth it.$0#$b#Like birdwatching, but with trains."/quickQuestion #Have you seen any so far?#What's the point, anyways?#That sounds boring.(break)speak Devan "Two, up until now.$0#$b#The last train was full of coal, and some bits dropped as it passed by...$2#$b#So I hope to see the train better next time."\friendship Devan 20(break)speak Devan "These machines are amazing. Did you know? They can run on 4 types of energy: Horse-pulled, Steam, Diesel, and Electricity.$1#$b#I used to live in a location where you could only get by train.$0"(break)speak Devan "Well, what's the point in farming?$5"\friendship Devan -50/pause 1000/emote Devan 40/speak Devan "...At any rate, you can stay if you want.$0#$b#But i'm warning you, something may fall when the train comes.$0#$e#I hope you have something to cover yourself with.$1"/emote farmer 28/end

Entries.110371500/F/f Devan 1500/p Devan: continue/34 25/Devan 34 25 2 farmer 33 25 2/skippable/pause 4000/speak Devan "Hey, @."/pause 2000/speak Devan "You know, i used to be a teacher there- at the town where i grew in. $0#$b#We were far from the big city, and sustained ourselves by farming.$0#$b#...Then things changed.$2"/stopMusic/pause 500/playMusic desolate/speak Devan "With time, the our water source dried up. People started moving out, because farming wasn't possible anymore...$2#$b#I stayed. I didn't want to leave my students behind, but their families needed to. And it was for their sake, too.#$b#When I moved to the city, I lost contact. It was hard to find a new job, and it all began to pile up.$2"/pause 500/speak devan "Then, I heard of the valley.$7"/pause 2000/speak Devan "When i arrived, i didn't have where to stay...but by some coincidence, i met Gus. He offered a spare room i could stay at- in exchange of working there.#$b#He said, many people had the same experience as i did."/stopMusic/pause 500/playMusic spring_night_ambient/pause 2000/quickQuestion Why did you move here, @?#I wanted to escape the city, too.#It was my grandfather's farm.#I wanted money.(break)speak Devan "I see. So it's true...it's as if this place appears when you most need it.$7"\friendship Devan 50(break)speak Devan "So, he left it to you? Makes sense."(break)speak Devan "Really? That's it? $6#$b#You could make much more money at the city."\friendship Devan -20(break)speak Devan "Anyways, thanks for hearing my story."/end

Entries.110371000/F/f Devan 1000/p Leah: jaunty/7 6/Leah 9 5 2 Devan 10 7 2 farmer 7 20 0/skippable/animate Leah false true 500 32 33 34/animate Devan false true 5000 20/pause 5000/speak Leah "Stay still. I'm almost done."/speak Devan "How longer? My arms are starting to hurt...$2#$b#The river sounds so nice...i might fall asleep.$1"/speak Leah "If you do that, i'll have to start over.$2"/emote Devan 28/warp farmer 7 9/playSound doorClose/pause 500/speak Leah "Hello, @. Sorry... I'm busy right now.$0#$b#Devan is helping me with a difficult pose i want to draw. I was having a hard time with this one."/speak Devan "Hey, so about 'that'...$2#$b#What i commissioned last week. How is progress coming along?$1"/speak Leah "It's done. It came out just like you asked."/stopAnimation Leah 35/pause 500/animate Leah false false 500 8 9 10 11/playSound pickUpItem/pause 1000/stopAnimation Leah 0/addObject 8 5 99/pause 100/stopAnimation Devan 8/pause 600/speak Devan "...$6#$b#...I swear to Yoba, it's amazing. It looks just like what i had in mind. $1"/speak Leah "After we're done here, you can take it home."/emote Devan 20/end

Entries.110372000/f Devan 2000/p Devan/t 2000 26: Saloon1/7 20/Devan 3 19 2 Elliott 2 20 1 Gus 10 18 2 Emily 15 17 0 Clint 19 23 3 Shane 21 17 2 Willy 17 22 2 farmer 4 21 0/skippable/showFrame Devan 36/pause 3000/speak Devan "...Yeah, and that's what we did."/pause 100/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Elliott "You seem a bit too amused...that crab almost tore my hair off.$2#$b#Though, you didn't escape their claws either.$1"/speak Devan "It's a bit hot...i'll go outside for a bit."/question fork goWithDevan staywithElliott "@, do you want to come with me?#I'll go with you.#I'll stay with Elliott."/fork goWithDevan 2000_goWithDevan/fork staywithElliott 2000_staywithElliott
Entries.2000_goWithDevan: skippable/stopMusic/changeLocation Town/viewport 45 72/globalFadeToClear 2000/pause 500/warp farmer 45 71 2/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 1/move farmer -2 0/faceDirection farmer 2 continue/pause 1000/warp Devan 45 71/move Devan 0 1/playSound doorClose/pause 1500/speak Devan "Hey, @.#$e#I wanted to tell you something.#$e#You know...the town where i grew wasnt always so lonely.$0#$b#We used to be a tight knit community. The farms made money selling their goods, and would sell them to many places in Ferngill."/pause 500/speak Devan "It was normal to see trains there. Sometimes, while i'd work at the school, i'd hear its whistle as it passed by.$0#$b#...Truth be told, i miss being teacher.$2#$b#I wonder if those kids, and their families, found a better place...$7"/pause 1000/speak Devan "Sitting to watch for trains calmed me down. It reminded me of home. I had no idea if i'd fit here, and i was scared­.$2#$b#But, @... nowadays, i feel i'm part of the community.$7#$b#You've been a valuable friend to me­.$1#$b#I loved the town i grew in, and i'll miss it... but it's okay to move on, too. This is my home now."/emote Devan 20/speak Devan "...Elliot must be getting bored. We should head back.#$e#Hey, do you want a drink?$6#$b#My treat.$1"/end dialogue Devan "...$7#$b#Thank you for coming with us today, @.$0#$b#I really appreciate your company.$1"
Entries.2000_staywithElliott: skippable/speak Devan "Sure.#$b#I won't take too long.$1"/pause 500/move Devan 3 0/move Devan 0 4/move Devan 8 0/move Devan 0 1/playSound doorClose/warp Devan -20 -20/pause 500/stopMusic/speak Elliott "I get the feeling we'll have a while to talk.#$e#...@?$1#$b#Lately, i've noticed something quite intriguing."/pause 1000/speak Elliott "...At first, Devan didn't talk much with our neighbors.#$b#They seemed...off, to be honest. Quite too distant.$2#$e#Except when Leah is around. Then, Devan loosens up a bit."/pause 500/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "However..."/pause 300/speak Elliott "Ever since you two became friends, Devan seems happier.#$b#You've made Devan feel at home here."/pause 800/speak Elliott "It's quite refreshing.$1"/pause 200/playSound doorClose/[make devan visible]/move Devan 0 -2/speak Devan "Hey, the breeze outside is very refreshing.#$b#Did i take too long?#$e#...Hey, what's with that face?$6"/pause 100/emote farmer 40/emote Elliott 40/pause 500/speak Elliott "Not much. We were making small talk while waiting.#$b#I'd like to continue telling @ about when we tried the crab pots by ourselves."/emote Devan 20/pause 200/move Devan 0 -1/move Devan -5 0/end
